delegation_id.description: Stable identifier for this delegation artefact.

principal_id.description: Identifier for the principal granting authority.

agent_id.description: Identifier for the agent receiving authority.

capacity.description: Capacity in which the agent is authorised to act.

scope.description: Machine-readable list of permitted act classes. Intentionally minimal at spec-first stage.

duration.description: Temporal bounds. Open-ended authority should be explicit and is discouraged by default.

constraints.description: Optional constraints (max amounts, venues, countersign requirements). Left open to preserve flexibility.

revocation_ref.description: Pointer or mechanism enabling verifiers to check revocation or expiry state.

proof.description: Optional proof material (signatures, attestations). Intentionally unspecified at spec-first stage.
